resources.string: Warning, the external storage is only in read mode. This does not result in malfunction
Error, the external storage cannot be used. It is not in a corret format or it is not formated.
Error, the external storage was not found. Please insert a external storage on the device.
Error, the external storage is not mounted because it is shared or connected through the USB. Plug out and try again.
Error, the external storage cannot be mounted. This may be happen when the external storage is corrupted or crashed.
Error, the external storage is on the device but it is not mounted. Please, mount it.
